title: io.quarkus.platform:999-SNAPSHOT does not fail
body:
### Describe the bug

I was testing a demo, with the BOM imported from:

```
<quarkus.platform.artifact-id>quarkus-bom</quarkus.platform.artifact-id>
<quarkus.platform.group-id>io.quarkus.platform</quarkus.platform.group-id>
<quarkus.platform.version>3.3.2</quarkus.platform.version>
```

and then I thought I'd try the main branch quickly to test some fix, so I did 

```
<quarkus.platform.artifact-id>quarkus-bom</quarkus.platform.artifact-id>
<quarkus.platform.group-id>io.quarkus.platform</quarkus.platform.group-id>
<quarkus.platform.version>999-SNAPSHOT</quarkus.platform.version>
```
and started seeing unexpected DevUI pages, etc and took me a long while to spot I had to do:

```
<quarkus.platform.artifact-id>quarkus-bom</quarkus.platform.artifact-id>
<quarkus.platform.group-id>io.quarkus</quarkus.platform.group-id>
<quarkus.platform.version>999-SNAPSHOT</quarkus.platform.version>
```
